Cursed Captain

Unlocks

The Cursed Captain can be unlocked for 8000 .

Ability

CurseGains ability based on number of Curses in deck:
1 Curse: At start of battle, heal 3.
3 Curses: Reload 1 whenever a Curse is discarded or removed.
5 Curses: Draw a card whenever a Curse is discarded or removed.
7 Curses: At end of turn, if you did not use an Attack card this turn, deal 5 damage to all enemies per Curse in your hand.
9 Curses: Upgrade all Skill cards at start of battle.
